    • listItems

      @GetMapping public String listItems(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to display the list of items.
      Parameters:
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the items list page

    • getItem

      @RequestMapping(value="/{itemId}", method=GET) public String getItem(@PathVariable("itemId") Long itemId, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws org.springframework.web.servlet.NoHandlerFoundException
      Handles the GET request to display an item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to display
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the item view page
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.servlet.NoHandlerFoundException - if no item is found with the specified ID

    • searchItems

      @GetMapping("/search") public String searchItems(@RequestParam("query") String query, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to search for items.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the items list page with search results

    • addItemForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @GetMapping("admin/add") public String addItemForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to display the add item form.
      Parameters:
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the add item form

    • handleItemForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @PostMapping("admin/add") public String handleItemForm(@Valid @ModelAttribute("item") @Valid ItemDto itemDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the POST request to handle the add item form submission.
      Parameters:
      itemDto - the ItemDto object containing the item data
      result - the BindingResult object for validating the form data
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the added item view page

    • editItemForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @GetMapping("admin/edit/{itemId}") public String editItemForm(@PathVariable("itemId") Long itemId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to display the edit item form.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to edit
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the edit item form

    • handleEditItemForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @PostMapping("admin/edit") public String handleEditItemForm(@Valid @ModelAttribute("item") @Valid ItemDto itemDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the POST request to handle the edit item form submission.
      Parameters:

      result - the BindingResult object for validating the form data

      Returns:
      the view name for the updated item view page

    • deleteItem

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @DeleteMapping("/admin/delete/{itemId}") public String deleteItem(@PathVariable("itemId") Long itemId)
      Handles the DELETE request to delete an item.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the ID of the item to delete
      Returns:
      the view name for the items list page after successful deletion
